description.value: Aanduiding van de categorie van de beperking.

purpose.value: This CodeSystem resource represents the the COD539 'codelijst' as defined by Zorginstituut Nederland. Its contents can be found at https://www.istandaarden.nl/binaries/content/assets/istandaarden/iwlz/iwlz-2.2.1/codelijsten-iwlz-2.2.1.xlsx (Excel).
